Poconos Retreats

With Lake Harmony at your doorstep and the Poconos Mountains in the background, Split Rock Resort is the perfect place for you to customize your next group retreat. Our location, extensive amenities, and affordable cost allow the flexibility to meet your group's needs. We offer a variety of retreat packages to suit every gathering and age group.

Split Rock Group Retreat Packages are available for both midweek and weekends and are customizable to include:

  • Multiple Days of Overnight Accommodations
  • Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner Options
  • Workshops, Teambuilding & Outdoor Activities
  • Passes to H2Oooohh! Indoor Water park
  • Group Meeting Spaces
  • Banquets and Receptions

Call (888) 802-2348 and ask to speak with our sales department for more information.
